attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am petitioning to have the fare rises that are constantly happning on trains across the nation, reduced. As a construction worker and avid Ssouthend United Fan i use the trains atleast 6 days a week for both business nd pleasure and my fairs have risen quite dramiticly, therefore forcing me to miss doing the things i enjoy most. Im sure it is the same for many others. So lets stop this before it gets out of hand.!!
